amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the Federal Maritime Commission by $100,000 and applies the savings to the Spending Reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Federal Maritime Commission account by $100,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
